use_cases.title: Create New Task
use_cases.description: The user creates a new task, providing task details such as title, description, and due date.
use_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and has permission to create tasks

main_flow.step: The user enters task details (title, description, due date)
main_flow.step_description: The user provides the necessary details for the new task
The user clicks the submit button to create the new task

main_flow.step: The system validates and creates the task
main_flow.step_description: The system checks for errors and creates the new task if valid

alternate_flows.step: The user cancels the task creation
alternate_flows.step_description: The user clicks the cancel button to abandon the task creation

use_cases.postconditions: The new task is created and displayed in the task list
use_cases.business_value: Allows users to create and manage tasks efficiently

use_cases.title: Assign Task to Team Member
use_cases.description: The user assigns a task to a team member, specifying the team member's role and due date.
use_cases.preconditions: User is logged in, team member is logged in, and task exists

main_flow.step: The user selects the task to assign
main_flow.step_description: The user selects the task they want to assign to a team member

main_flow.step: The user selects the team member
main_flow.step_description: The user selects the team member to assign the task to

main_flow.step: The user sets the due date
main_flow.step_description: The user sets the due date for the task assignment

main_flow.step: The system validates and assigns the task
main_flow.step_description: The system checks for errors and assigns the task to the team member if valid

alternate_flows.step: The user cancels the task assignment
alternate_flows.step_description: The user clicks the cancel button to abandon the task assignment

use_cases.postconditions: The task is assigned to the team member and displayed in their task list
use_cases.business_value: Enables efficient task management and collaboration among team members

use_cases.title: View Task Details
use_cases.description: The user views the details of a task, including task history and comments.
use_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and has permission to view task details

main_flow.step: The user selects the task to view
main_flow.step_description: The user selects the task they want to view details for
The system displays the task details, including task history and comments

use_cases.business_value: Provides users with essential task information

use_cases.title: Create Custom Workflow
use_cases.description: The user creates a custom workflow by defining a sequence of tasks and assigning tasks to team members.
use_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and has permission to create custom workflows

main_flow.step: The user defines the workflow sequence
main_flow.step_description: The user defines the sequence of tasks they want to create

main_flow.step: The user assigns tasks to team members
main_flow.step_description: The user assigns tasks to team members in the defined sequence

main_flow.step: The system validates and creates the custom workflow
main_flow.step_description: The system checks for errors and creates the custom workflow if valid

use_cases.postconditions: The custom workflow is created and displayed
use_cases.business_value: Allows users to create tailored workflows to meet their specific needs

use_cases.title: View Reporting and Analytics
use_cases.description: The user views reporting and analytics data, including task completion rates and team performance.
use_cases.preconditions: User is logged in and has permission to view reporting and analytics

main_flow.step: The user selects the reporting and analytics option
main_flow.step_description: The user selects the reporting and analytics option from the menu

main_flow.step: The system displays reporting and analytics data
main_flow.step_description: The system displays the reporting and analytics data, including task completion rates and team performance

use_cases.postconditions: The reporting and analytics data are displayed
use_cases.business_value: Provides users with valuable insights into task completion rates and team performance

business_requirements.overview: The Complete Test Task Management App will provide a comprehensive platform for users to create, assign, view, and manage tasks, with a focus on collaboration and efficiency.
business_goals: Provide users with essential task information
constraints: Limited budget for development and maintenance
assumptions: Users will have basic knowledge of task management concepts
Users will have permission to create and assign tasks
risks: Technical difficulties with custom workflow creation
